Run comprehensive blocking test on user agents

Source: R/blocking.R
run_blocking_test.Rd

Tests a sample of user agents against multiple websites to determine which user agents are most effective for web scraping.

Usage

run_blocking_test(
  user_agents,
  sites = default_test_sites(),
  delay = 0.5,
  progress = TRUE
)

Arguments

user_agents

A tibble with user agent data (must have 'useragent_string' column)

sites

Character vector of URLs to test against

delay

Delay between requests in seconds (default 0.5)

progress

Show progress bar (default TRUE)

Value

A tibble with user agent info and blocking scores

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Load user agent data
ua_data <- readRDS("data/chrome.rds")
sample_ua <- ua_data[1:10, ]

# Run blocking test
results <- run_blocking_test(sample_ua, sites = default_test_sites()[1:3])
} # }
